name: La Tradicion II Connecticut Shade Robusto
additionalNotes:
http://store.lqhouseofcigars.com/latradicionii-connecticutshadewrapper.aspx

Mild Body - Leather & Spice - A 4 leaf fill featuring 3 unique plant strains from Santo Domingo and 1 from Columbia

This blend pays homage to traditional Old School  Cuban style blending of years gone by. It is best described as having mega-flavor for a light cigar. Built to please a European palette accustomed to richer tobacco blends,  this cigar makes our Master Roller homesick every time he smokes one! 

The earthy aromas, the traditional long white ash, and the melding of light spice and leather flavors in this blend are so authentic, you can simply close your eyes and let your senses transport you to the Golden Age of Old Havana cigar production. This blend celebrates the heritage & noble tradition of hand crafting serious cigars. 

It  is a stellar smoke in the light and creamy Connecticut Shade Wrapper.
